DataElement.preferredName: Person History Elapsed Time Last Cancer Screening Year Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text that describes the length of time in years between the first and any subsequent cancer screening examination.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being._A term for diseases in which abnormal cells divide without control. Cancer cells can invade nearby tissues and can spread through the bloodstream and lymphatic system to other parts of the body._The use of any device, marker, or other means for the purpose of detecting the presence of disease, usually in asymptomatic individuals._The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events.

Property.preferredDefinition: A tumor composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues.  Malignant neoplasms usually metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision.  The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas (adenocarcinomas or squamous cell carcinomas), Hodgkin's and non-Hodgkin's lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas. -- 2004:Checking for disease when there are no symptoms.:The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events.

Concepts.definition: A neoplasm composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues. Malignant neoplasms often metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision. The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas, Hodgkin and non-Hodgkin lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas.
The use of any device, marker, or other means for the purpose of detecting the presence of disease, usually in asymptomatic individuals.
The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ValueDomain.preferredName: Elapsed Time Last Screening Year Category
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The interval between two reference points in time._The most recent screening._The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days._Category; used informally to mean a class of things.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: A natural number greater than 9 and less than 11 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of nine and one.: The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A natural number greater than 9 and less than 11 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of nine and one.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.: The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

Concepts.definition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Elapsed Time Last Screening Year Category
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The interval between two reference points in time.:The most recent screening.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:Category; used informally to mean a class of things.

Concepts.definition: The interval between two reference points in time.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.
